body.name: Willz WLCMV207S2-07 Countertop Small Microwave Oven with 6 Preset Cooking Programs Interior Light LED Display, 0.7 Cu.Ft, Stainless Steel
features: 【11 POWER LEVELS & MULTISTAGE COOKING】Willz 700 watt microwave with 11 variable power levels allows you to adjust the cooking power from 0% to 100%. You can also set up 2 cooking stages at different power levels and time settings for fully customization!

【6 PRESET MENUS & EXPRESS COOKING】Easy to cook with 6 one-touch cooking programs: potato, popcorn, pizza, beverage, frozen dinner and reheat. Also, you can start cooking 1-6 min quickly with the press of corresponding number pad.

【CHILD LOCK & DEFROST FUNCTIONS】The optional safety lock helps to prevent the curious hands and unsupervised operation by children. With the defrost function, your favorite frozen foods can be ready for meal more quickly.

【INTERIOR LIGHT & LED DISPLAY】The compact microwave comes with interior light to give you a better vision of cooking status without opening the door. The LED screen clearly shows the cooking time, power, indicators and present time.

【COMPACT SIZE & TURNTABLE】Measures 17.6" W x 12.9" D x 9.6" H with 0.7 Cu.Ft capacity, this countertop microwave is compact and space-saving! It also equppied with a 9.7" glass turntable, which is removable and easy to clean up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Willz 0.7 Cu Ft, 700 watts microwave oven with its Stainless Steel look can complement your kitchen with different styles. This thoughtful microwave oven offers six one touch start cooking way to quick start the Potato, Popcorn, Pizza, Beverage and more. It is easy to add 30 SEC. during cooking as well as time/ weight defrost. Time cook enables cooking at multiple power and time settings automatically, which can get perfect results without interruption. Specification: Power: 700W 6 One Touch Cook Menus (Potato, Popcorn, Pizza, Beverage, Frozen Dinner, Reheat) Time/ Weight Defrost, Express Cook Kitchen Timer Push Button Interior Light Product Dimension: 17.56'' X 12.94'' X 9.56''(W X D X H) Product Weight: 20.7lbs

LED Display Helps you to read the time easily. 6 One Touch Cook Menus Potato, Popcorn, Pizza, Beverage, Frozen Dinner, Reheat. 11 Variable Power Levels 11 power levels allow you to adjust the power from 0% to 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m not home while writing this review otherwise I’d have a photo. However I love this microwave so far. It’s sleek pretty match with my kitchen aesthetic. It works efficiently and doesn’t take up too much counter space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like size and features. Works very well!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came in clutch when ours went out!overnight!
reviews.reviewText: It’s simple very effe tive heats all the way thru

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is Small
reviews.reviewText: May be too small for most people. Would be great for dorms, and small kitchens. Only thing is that it is the size of the ones in convenience stores. The interior is wide enough, deep enough, but height wise, can be problematic if it’s a tall mug or container . It is also a little louder when in use than other models. It’s microwaves okay , but takes longer to fully heat or cook something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I am pleased with it
reviews.reviewText: So far, It works like I want it to work. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this!!
reviews.reviewText: This microwave makes cooking very frustrating. On most microwaves the number is selected, and it cooks easily. When I set the cooking time, even a couple of minutes and press start, it quits and goes to 30 seconds of cooking time. So if I want to cook something 2 minutes after the cooking indicator to 59 seconds down to 30. So if I want toCook something for 2 minutes I have to stand and reset it 40. Microwaving should be easy, not like this.I'm sorry I wasted my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works ok but settings are very confusing
reviews.reviewText: It's a good little microwave. But it has a big problem. The settings are extremely user UNfriendly and backwards.Where you normally have the keypad to set the number of seconds/minutes, it's instead a keypad that sets directly the minutes, so let's say you would want to press 45 on a normal microwave for 45 seconds - not this one, you press 4 and it automatically starts for preset 4 minutes.The instructions are pretty much in Engrish and to this day (I've had it for over a month) I was still unable to figure out how to set the clock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this slightly used and looks brand new!

The microwave was adorable. Unfortunately it simply didn’t work. Had to slam the door to get it to lock and then tried to microwave a cup of water. Seven minutes later the water was still as cool as Egan it left the tap. Returned and bought a different one.
